about: Welcome to my GameDev journey! Here, I'll be documenting my progress and showcasing my projects as I learn and grow in game development.

projects.title: Project 1: Navigating out of Tutorial Hell
projects.description: In a state of perpetual learning endlessly consuming tutorials, collecting snippets of knowledge, but struggling to break free and create my own games. Determined to bridge the gap between learning and doing.

projects.title: Project 2: Advanced Platformer
projects.description: Details about my second, more advanced game project using either Unreal Engine or Godot.
